name: Letter-pop
body:
Letterpop
=========
Have you ever thought to yourself, "Boy, my web users need to be able to just pop this letters." Guess what - I totes thought the same thing. And so, here is letter-pop, a jQuery plugin to pop the letters of an element.
tagline: A jQuery script to pop the letters of an element.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
